DOC.brief_title: User Evaluation Healthy Volunteers Verify Pelvic Floor Contraction Stimulated When Modified Neurotech Vital Device Used Compared Neurotech Vital Device
DOC.detailed_description: This user evaluation study verify Modified Neurotech Vital Device stimulate pelvic floor muscle compare Neurotech Vital Device . Stimulation pelvic floor muscle assess use sonographic/real time ultrasound imaging/recording displacement measurement use onscreen calliper sonogram unit assess contraction .
DOC.criteria: Subjects meet follow inclusion criterion include study . Subjects female least 18 year age . Subjects , opinion Investigator , deem healthy . Subjects able give voluntary , write informed consent participate study consent obtain . Subjects able understand study willing complete study assessment . Subjects meet follow criterion exclude participation study . Subjects exist medical condition would compromise participation study . Subjects physical condition would make unable perform study procedure . Subjects history respiratory condition include chronic cough . Subjects history underlie neurological condition . Subjects history low back pain involve spinal nerve root . Subjects blood clot disorder take anticoagulant medication . Subjects previously urogynaecological relate surgery exclude hysterectomy . Subjects clinical diagnosis prolapse great Stage 2 . Subjects pregnant could pregnant . Subjects le 6 month postpartum lactate . Subjects intrauterine device metal implant pelvic area , include hip lumbar spine . Subjects pelvic pain fibromyalgia paravaginal defect . Subjects active implanted medical device ( ie pacemaker , pump etc ) . Subjects history heart disease stroke . Subjects know cancer . Subjects injury disability affect part body contact garment . Subjects currently involved injury litigation claim . Subjects committed institution virtue order issue either court authority . Subjects participate clinical study last 3 month .
